definitions.definition: The first month of the Islamic calendar , when many Islamic communities hold a festival commemorating the deaths of the grandsons of Mohammed.
A Shiite festival held during its first ten days; Ashura .

main_definition: The first month of the Islamic calendar , when many Islamic communities hold a festival commemorating the deaths of the grandsons of Mohammed. [from 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: A Shiite festival held during its first ten days; Ashura .
